login.message: Learn in-demand skills and core business concepts to enhance your education, start your own business, or secure a better job with our free, accessible digital learning courses.

logout.label: Log out
logout.prompt: Are you sure you want to logout?

sideMenu.hpFoundation: A program of the HP Foundation.

profile.nameNote: Note: The name you enter will appear on certificates of completion you earn.
profile.newsletter: Please update me on HP LIFE news and events.

pushNotification.message: Enable push notifications on this device.

noPermission.title: Permission
noPermission.body: Please enable push notifications to use this feature.

deleteAccount.label: Request account deletion
deleteAccount.prompt:
Are you sure you want to delete account?

Your transcript and certificate(s) will be permanently deleted.

errors.tooShort: Password must contain atleast 8 characters including uppercase,lowercase,special character and digits.
errors.needSpecialCharacter: Password must contain atleast 8 characters including uppercase,lowercase,special character and digits.

myCourse.noCourse: You are not currently enrolled in any courses.
myCourse.noEbookTitle: You have not downloaded any offline courses.
myCourse.noEbookMessage: Courses marked as ‘Available offline’ can be downloaded when you have an internet connection so they are ready for you to take whenever you are offline.
myCourse.noCertificate: You have not completed any courses.
myCourse.badgeShareMessage: Share What You Have Learned on HP LIFE.
myCourse.badgeInformation: To earn a badge, you will need to complete all of the courses in one language within a category. You can earn a badge for any category that has two or more courses. To learn more about the badges you can earn, <*>please visit this page</*>.

ebookDeletePrompt.title: Delete this offline course?
ebookDeletePrompt.message: If you have not completed this course, deleting it will result in a loss of progress.

pushNotification.title: Stay Updated
pushNotification.body: Get notified whenever there is HP LIFE news.

android.title: There is a new version of the HP LIFE app.
android.message: Please update your app now by visiting the Google Play Store.

ios.title: There is a new version of the HP LIFE app.
ios.message: Please update your app now by visiting the App Store.

progressDifference.title: Reading Progress
progressDifference.message: The save location on cloud does not match the location on your device. Please choose which save location you want to use.

takeSurvey.title: Congratulations!
takeSurvey.message: You have reached the end of this course. To earn your Certificate of Completion, please complete the course survey.
